Gorey Coder Dojo Lessons Website

The Gorey Coder Dojo Lessons website contains all the lessons for each class offered in the Dojo.

Your mentor will explain how to start with the lessons.

You are free to work your own way through them in your spare time.

If you get stuck you can ask for help on the Google+ Help Group.
